task.title: Task: Opening workbook
task.shortdesc: Instructions on how to open an existing workbook, an Excel file.

taskbody.prereq: To perform this task, the practice files should be available on your computer, or USB stick.

context.p:
Commonly used methods to open an existing workbook are:
Double-clicking with Windows Explorer on an Excel file.
Choose Open in the Excel start screen.
Choose File Open in Excel.
The first method opens the file directly in Excel.

The other two methods gives you first the dialog window Open Dialog window Open
Dialog window Open

With the choice This PC or Browse you can browse to the file. You also have the possibility to open files with other formats. To do this, click on the arrow in the bottom right corner at the file type list: Choosing file format
Choosing file format
